results.deck: Outlaw is a mobile 1-on-1 bullet hell shooting game.
results.description:
Game Modes:

Battle

- This 1-on-1 battle is the main feature where each player boasts one's skill and own deck of skill cards.

Additional bonus modes.

All the bonus modes, so far, are endless shooting (or evading) mode. The longer a player stays in the game, the higher score the player earns.

Boss Battle

Player has to attack parts of the Boss characters (A huge robot) to earn the highest score possible.

Monster Defense

Hordes of enemies are approaching. Player has to be agile and able to utilize the special cards.

Evade Bullets

This is in the veins of classic "bullet hell" or "bullet curtain" game. Player has to try stay alive as long as one can.

(Coming Soon)

Titled as "Infinite Mode."

(Coming Soon)

Titled as "Consecutive Win Mode."
results.name: Outlaw

results.deck: Project Zero Deaths is an online platformer shooter. Expect a fast-paced team vs team multiplayer experience with a huge variety of crazy weapons and heroes.
results.description:
Project Zero Deaths is cross-platform online multiplayer platformer shooter. It features fast-paced team-versus-team multiplayer gameplay experience with large amount of physics-based environments, weapons and characters to choose from.

To simply describe how battles look in Project Zero Deaths - imagine two teams composed of different set of characters fighting each other in physics-based 2d environment. Characters have different characteristics and capable of using different special abilities. All of them armed to the teeth with weapons that came right out of some crazy sci-fi action fantasy. For example a shotgun that shoots ice shards that freeze in the air and detonates on contact or a portable black hole launcher that pulls everyone into a point of singularity. Unpredictable situations are bound to happen.

The host of this blood sport is simply called "Project Coordinator". It's real motives with this project are yet to be announced, but at the moment it looks like a crazy entertainment show for whole Universe to enjoy. Although some people say, that this mysterious figure is in constant search for talented subjects from all around the Universe with offer to join the party.

Players are able to join forces with their friends, form a team (or go alone and be paired with random teammates) and compete with other players on 4 competitive game modes. Each game mode have a different set of carefully crafted maps that encourages different play styles and tests player's skills of adaptation and teamwork.

The game is in Steam Early Access, open beta on Google Play store, Testflight on iOS.

We invite all the community to try the game and give their feedback on Project Zero Deaths discord channel: https://discord.gg/XEVtPp4

For more information and all early access download links please visit www.projectzerodeaths.com
results.name: Project Zero Deaths

results.description:
Super Mega Space Blaster Special is a retro styled, fast-paced space shooter (shmup). The game Draws on games from yesteryear like Asteroids and The Galactic Plague as well as modern shooters like Bit Blaster XL and Super Stardust HD. This creates a shoot 'em up with modern mechanics that fills the player with retro gaming nostalgia. The game has local coop and competitive modes and an extensive features list for it's low price. Features include:

  • 10 space blasters to unlock.
  • 3 game modes.
  • Local coop & competitive multiplayer.
  • Full controller support with in game images for PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch Pro controllers.
  • 20+ challenges.
  • Loads of power-ups and weapons.
  • Achievements.
  • Leaderboards.
  • Cross platform cloud-save.
  • An 80's infused synth-pop sound track by Electric Fan Death.
results.name: Super Mega Space Blaster Special

results.description:
Project Genesis is a team based, PVP hero shooter. Players choose both a ship with unique attributes for space combat in third person and an avatar (character) with unique abilities for first person combat aboard capital ships.

The game is in pre-alpha phase and undergoing open, transparent development with its community in order to build with frequent iteration according to feedback.

Access is currently closed and only available through play test sessions which can be subscribed via the project's website and Steam page.
results.name: Project Genesis

results.deck: Watch Dogs Legion is the third game in Ubisoft's open-world, third-person, action adventure series.
results.name: Watch Dogs: Legion

results.deck: Power Gunner is a Bullet Hell, Score chaser with controls loosely based off Lunar Lander.
results.description:
Overview

Power Gunner was created by Mega Toast Games, a two person indie studio based out of Vancouver. Power Gunner is a Bullet Hell Score chaser with controls loosely based off Lunar Lander. The player can collect power ups and stat boosters while trying to kill as many enemies as possible.

Stat Boosters

ImageStat
Shield stat boost increases the players maximum shield capacity
Fuel stat boost increases the players maximum fuel capacity.
Damage stat boost increases the damage the players main guns do to enemies.

Other Pickups

ImagePickup
Civilians when picked up recharges a small amount of the players shields
Fuel when picked up recharges a small amount of the players fuel
Power Ups when picked up will give the player a temporary ability - make sure to get the ones the bosses drop as these add permanent abilities to the players ship
results.name: Power Gunner

results.deck: The Seven Deadly Sins: Hikari to Yami no Grand Cross (Grand Cross of Light and Darkness) is a Mobile RPG published by Netmarble, with card strategy and gacha elements.
results.name: The Seven Deadly Sins: Hikari to Yami no Grand Cross

results.deck: Hyper Slasher is a single screen brawler.
results.description:
Hyper Slasher is a over the top brawler with single player and local / online multiplayer. All the entertainment is locked to one screen so all players can watch the action and see all the and deaths.

Modes

Survival

Survival mode is intended to be for single player, where the player hase to battle through hordes of enemies and survive as long as possible. This can also be played with up to 4 players.

Deathmatch

In this mode it is the first player to reach 20 kills that wins. There are bots that will join in if there is less than 4 players.
results.name: Hyper Slasher

results.description: Lego Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga showcases the events of all nine Skywalker Saga films: The Phantom Menace (1999), Attack of the Clones (2002), Revenge of the Sith (2005), A New Hope (1977), The Empire Strikes Back (1980), Return of the Jedi (1983), The Force Awakens (2015), The Last Jedi (2017) and The Rise of Skywalker (2019). As of development, the developers haven't been given any details of the last film to prevent spoilers until the film's December 2019 release.
results.name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga

results.name: Skycurser

results.deck: A mini-game collection from Devolver Digital, featuring cheap bootlegs of games by... Devolver Digital.
results.description:
Overview

Devolver Bootleg is a comedic mini-game collection developed by doinksoft and published digitally by Devolver Digital for the PC (via Steam) on June 9, 2019.

Stylized after unlicensed and bootleg multicarts for the Nintendo Entertainment System, Devolver Bootleg contains eight "original rip-offs" of games previously published by Devolver Digital. While some games are simplistic versions of the games they're based on, other games are unique adaptations.

Games

  • Enter the Dungeon - Based on Dodge Roll's Enter the Gungeon. Also known in-game as "Enter the Gun Dungeon". A top-down shooter and a simplistic take on the base game.
  • Hotline Milwaukee - Based on Dennaton's Hotline Miami. A top-down strategic action game and a simplistic take on the base game.
  • Ape Out Jr. - Based on Gabe Cuzzillo's Ape Out. A 2D platformer reminiscent of Donkey Kong Jr.
  • Shooty Boots - Based on Moppin's Downwell. Also known in-game as "Shootyboots". A vertically-scrolling action game and a simplistic take on the base game.
  • Luftrousers - Based on Vlambeer's Luftrausers. Also known in-game as "Luftrousers 3". A side-scrolling shoot-'em-up and a simplistic take on the base game.
  • Super Absolver Mini: Turbo Fighting Championship - Based on Sloclap's Absolver. Also known in-game as "Absolver". Two-player only. A 2D one-on-one fighting game where players choose their special moves from a limited set.
  • Catsylvania - Based on doinksoft's Gato Roboto. Also known in-game as "Cat Game". A 2D side-scrolling action platformer highly reminiscent of early Castlevania games.
  • PikuBiku Ball-Stars - Based on Sectordub's Pikuniku. Also known in-game as "Pikuniku Ball-Stars". A 2D one-on-one sports platformer where players must kick a ball through the goal on their opponent's side.
results.name: Devolver Bootleg
